title: Bob Dole Lies in State as Biden Hails Former Senator as ‘Giant of Our History’
sub_head: Former colleagues pay tribute to longtime GOP Senate leader, presidential candidate in Capitol Rotunda
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden hailed former Sen. Bob Dole as “a giant of our history” as he lay in state in the U.S. Capitol Rotunda on Thursday, with politicians who worked alongside the Kansas Republican paying tribute in the heart of the building where he served as a legislator for 36 years.
Mr. Dole, a World War II veteran, died Sunday morning in his sleep at the age of 98. Mr. Dole was a deeply respected, longtime Senate GOP leader, as well as a Republican nominee for both president and vice president.
